text: Jiaruo you yi bu “gulanjing”, keyong lai yidong shanyue, huo polie dadi, huo shi siren shuohua,(tamen bi bu xin ta). Buran, yiqie shiqing zhi guizhenzhu, nandao xindao de renmen bu zhidao ma? Jiaruo zhenzhu yiyu, ta bi yindao quan renlei. Bu xindao de renmen hai yaoyin ziji de xingwei er zaoshou zaiyang, huo tamen zhuzhai de fujin zaoshou zaiyang, zhidao zhenzhu de yingxu daolai.
